HomeFAQ.title: Dream Interpretation AI Guide
HomeFAQ.description: Learn how to get the most accurate AI dream analysis with our comprehensive guide. Our dream interpretation AI provides detailed insights into your dreams.

specific.title: How to Get Detailed Dream Analysis
specific.content: For the most accurate AI dream interpretation, include specific details about your dream symbols, emotions, and events. Our advanced dream interpretation AI analyzes every detail to provide comprehensive insights.

basic.title: Important Information for Dream Analysis
basic.content: Include basic information like your age and gender (e.g., '25F' or '30M') for more personalized dream interpretation. Our AI dream analyzer uses this context to provide more accurate dream meanings.

context.title: Waking Life Context in Dream Analysis
context.content: Share relevant life events or situations that might relate to your dream. Our AI dream Interpretation considers your real-life context to provide more meaningful dream interpretations.

death.title: Interpreting Dreams About Death
death.content: When sharing dreams about death or spirits, specify if the person is alive or deceased in reality. This helps our AI dream analyzer provide more accurate symbolic interpretations.

assumptions.title: Objective Dream Description
assumptions.content: Focus on describing what you experienced in your dream without personal interpretations. Let our AI dream interpretation tool analyze the raw dream content for unbiased insights.

openminded.title: Understanding Dream Symbolism
openminded.content: Stay open to various interpretations as dreams often contain deep symbolic meanings. Our AI dream Interpretation considers multiple perspectives and cultural symbolisms in its analysis.

HomeFAQ.footer: Get instant, accurate dream interpretations with our AI dream analyzer available 24/7

DreamInterpreter.title: Dream Interpretation AI

DreamInterpreter.placeholder: Describe your dream in detail... (For example: I was flying over a city at night, the lights below were like stars...)
DreamInterpreter.error: Sorry, there was an error interpreting your dream. Please try again.
DreamInterpreter.tip: The more details you provide, the better the interpretation will be

HowTo.title: How to Get Accurate Dream Interpretation with AI
HowTo.description: Follow these simple steps to receive a detailed AI-powered analysis of your dreams and unlock their hidden meanings.

record.title: Record Your Dream
record.description: Write down your dream immediately after waking while the details are fresh in your memory. Include all emotions, symbols, and events you can remember.

details.title: Add Context
details.description: Include relevant personal context like age, gender, and current life situations that might relate to your dream symbols.

analyze.title: AI Analysis
analyze.description: Our advanced Dream Interpretation AI will analyze your dream using multiple interpretation methods and symbolic meanings.

reflect.title: Personal Reflection
reflect.description: Review the AI interpretation and reflect on how it relates to your waking life and personal experiences.

HowTo.footer: Get started now with your free AI dream interpretation analysis
